translation.en: [Arin] It seems strange now,
translation.ko: 지금은 뭔가 이상하지만 닌자고 드래곤 라이징

translation.en: but remember when Ninjago was the only thing on the map?
translation.ko: 지도 위의 세상이 닌자고로 유일했던 때를 기억해 봐 〝병합 1부〞

translation.en: When it was our entire world?
I used to spend all my time trying to be like my heroes, the Ninja.
translation.ko: 그때 난 온종일 나의 영웅들 닌자처럼 되려고 노력했어

translation.en: Practicing their moves, learning their poses...
I wanted to be just like them.
To protect everyone in Ninjago.
translation.ko: 닌자고의 모든 이를 지켜 주고 싶었지

translation.en: To ride dragons into adventure and mythical realms.
translation.ko: 드래곤을 타고 신화 속 세계를 모험하고 싶었어

translation.en: Mysterious lands that could only exist in legend.
translation.ko: 전설 속에서만 존재하는 신비로운 세계로 말이야

translation.en: But I quickly found out those legendary realms
translation.ko: 그러나 곧 깨달았지 전설 속의 차원의 공간들이 실재한다는 걸

translation.en: are very real.
translation.ko: 전설 속의 차원의 공간들이 실재한다는 걸

translation.en: And I was about to lose everyone that was important to me.
translation.ko: 그리고 나에게 소중한 사람들을 전부 잃게 될 거란 것도

translation.en: My neighborhood must have been the very center of "The Merge."
translation.ko: 내가 살던 동네에서 차원의 공간들이 하나가 되는 병합이 이루어졌어

translation.en: But back then, we didn't know what to call it.
-[screaming] -[Arin] It was just chaos.
Arin, get inside! It's too dangerous out there!
translation.ko: 아린, 얼른 들어와! 지금 밖은 너무 위험해!

translation.en: -Arin! -[screaming continues]
[Arin] That's when my heroes, the Ninja, arrived!
translation.ko: 그 순간 나의 영웅들 닌자들이 나타났어

translation.en: We were in so much danger, but I couldn't help but be excited.
translation.ko: 그때 상황은 너무 위험했지만 난 솔직히 흥분됐어

translation.en: Hey, kid, you get lost?
[Arin] Jay, the Lightning Ninja!
Kai, Fire Ninja!
Cole, Earth Ninja!
Zane, Ice Ninja.
Nya, Water Ninja!
Lloyd, the Legendary Green Ninja!
[Lloyd] Hold on, kid.
Green Ninja, my parents are in that storm!
translation.ko: 그린 닌자 부모님이 폭풍 속에 갇혔어요

translation.en: You gotta save them!
[Lloyd] That's what we're here for!
[Arin] And that's when it happened.
As I saw my small neighborhood disappear
and a new city show up on the horizon,
translation.ko: 지평선 너머로 새로운 도시가 나타난 순간

translation.en: I realized I had witnessed "The Merge" firsthand.
translation.ko: 난 내가 병합을 직접 목격했다는 걸 깨달았어

translation.en: The moment all the mysterious realms
I had only heard about, merged with Ninjago,
translation.ko: 그 순간 닌자고와 하나로 합쳐진 거야

translation.en: for reasons no one's been able to figure out.
I survived, but I was alone.
My parents and everyone I ever knew had vanished.
translation.ko: 부모님과 내가 알던 모든 사람들이전부 사라졌지

translation.en: [Arin] Mom? Dad?
With my parents and home gone, I had to make a new life for myself.
translation.ko: 부모님과 집을 잃은 난 혼자 새 인생을 꾸려 가야 했어

translation.en: Before, everyone I knew looked like me.
translation.ko: 예전에 알던 사람들은 나랑 비슷하게 생겼었지

translation.en: Now I walk the streets with skeleton people,
translation.ko: 하지만 지금 내 옆에는 해골 인간이 걸어가고

translation.en: buy food from snail people,
sell pies to frog people!
translation.ko: 내가 만든 파이는 개구리 인간이 사지

translation.en: And since the Ninja disappeared,
I realized it's up to me to carry on their legendary tradition.
translation.ko: 그들의 전설적인 전통을 이어 갈 존재는 이제 나밖에 없어

translation.en: Arin, not to insult the dreams of my best new friend, but...
translation.ko: 아린, 절친의 꿈에 초 치는 소리는 하기 싫지만 넌

translation.en: you are so not a Ninja.
[Arin sighs] How would you know, Sora?
You didn't grow up with them like I did.
All I need is a master to train me.
translation.ko: 난 날 가르쳐 줄 사부님만 있으면 돼

translation.en: Sure! Ah, one problem.
There are no Ninja Masters around anymore.
translation.ko: 이 근처엔 닌자 마스터는 한 명도 없거든

translation.en: [Arin] Hey, have you found what we need yet?
I can only distract these dogs from making noise for so long.
translation.ko: 저 개들이 짖지 못하게 내가 시선을 끄는 것도 이제 한계야

translation.en: Uh, I don't have that many stories to tell.
translation.ko: 얘들한테 해 줄 얘기도 이젠 없다고

translation.en: Give me a second.
Boom! And we didn't even set off the...
[security robots] Halt! Halt! Halt!
[Arin] We should probably leave right about now.
translation.ko: 아무래도 이제는 좀 가야 할 것 같은데?

translation.en: I always like how you think.
[Arin] Oh, there's gotta be an easier way to get mechanical parts!
translation.ko: 기계 부품을 더 쉽게 구하는 방법은 없는 거야?

translation.en: There is. It's called "having money."
Which is not exactly our situation.
[Arin] After tomorrow it might be!
[security robots] Halt! Halt! Halt!
[Arin] All right, then. Ninja...
-You're not a ninja. -[Arin] Wannabe Ninja...
translation.ko: 넌 닌자 아니다 언젠간 되겠지 닌자고!

translation.en: Go!
Rough landing.
But you're getting better at that.
-[Arin grunts] -Let's go!
[grunts] Can you make a distraction?
I don't think these bots want to hear my story about the Merge.
translation.ko: 저 로봇들은 병합 얘기엔 전혀 관심 없을걸?

translation.en: Then do something else!
[Arin] Up here!
You, garbage can!
[security robots] Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.ko: 댄스, 댄스, 댄스 댄스, 댄스, 댄스

translation.en: Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.ko: 댄스, 댄스, 댄스 댄스, 댄스, 댄스

translation.en: I will never get over
how quickly you can hack stuff like that.
translation.ko: 어떻게 그렇게 빨리 해킹을 할 수 있지?

translation.en: What can I say? I'm just naturally good at tech stuff.
translation.ko: 글쎄 뭐랄까? 내가 타고난 기술 천재라서?

translation.en: It's been like that since I was a kid.
We might not have money,
but I'm sure the owners of this place would love
translation.ko: 내가 직접 만든 맛있는 파이는 있잖아

translation.en: one of my delicious homemade pies, right?
translation.ko: 여기 주인들 맘에도 들 거야 그렇지?

translation.en: As payment for the gear we're "borrowing."
Who doesn't love pie?
[security robots] Dance! Dance! Dance!
translation.ko: 댄스, 댄스, 댄스 댄스, 댄스, 댄스

translation.en: -[Sora] Hey, Mrs. R. -How's the wasp milk today?
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 알 아줌마 오늘은 특별히 더 멋져요

translation.en: Ooh, watch your step, Newt.
[Sora] Hey! Watch where you're going!
[Arin] I still can't get over how amazing the Kingdom of Imperium looks.
translation.ko: 임페리움 왕국은 아무리 봐도 대단한 것 같아 정말 너무 멋져

translation.en: It's perfect, isn't it?
Don't believe everything you hear about Imperium.
translation.ko: 임페리움에 대한 얘기를 전부 믿지는 마

translation.en: I'm from there, remember?
Their idea of "perfect" isn't mine.
translation.ko: 저곳에서 생각하는 완벽은 나랑 생각이 달랐지

translation.en: The Merge slamming it up against Ninjago
translation.ko: 병합 때문에 저기랑 닌자고가 충돌한 게

translation.en: gave me the perfect chance to get out.
And the perfect chance to meet me.
translation.ko: 나랑 만날 수 있는 완벽한 기회였잖아

translation.en: I'd still like to go there someday.
translation.ko: 그래도 난 저기에 가 보고 싶어

translation.en: Or go anywhere.
I've never been out of my old neighborhood.
translation.ko: 난 이 동네를 벗어나 본 적이 없거든

translation.en: Crossroads just grew up around the area
translation.ko: 크로스로드는 원래 우리 집이 있던 곳에서

translation.en: where my house used to be.
You want to experience other places?
Look around!
translation.ko: 네 주위를 봐 뭐 하러 다른 데를 가?

translation.en: [Sora] Why go anywhere when the best of all the realms
translation.ko: 네 주위를 봐 뭐 하러 다른 데를 가? 모든 차원에서 제일 좋은 것만 모여 있는 게 크로스로드인데

translation.en: have moved here to the Crossroads?
translation.ko: 모든 차원에서 제일 좋은 것만 모여 있는 게 크로스로드인데

translation.en: For example, me.
I'm glad you came here, Sora.
You're my BFF, my fam, but...
translation.ko: 넌 내 절친이고 가족이니까 하지만 우리 중엔

translation.en: some of us are only here
because we had nowhere else to go.
translation.ko: 달리 갈 곳이 없어서 여기에 있는 경우도 있어

translation.en: I understand, but you have to admit,
translation.ko: 무슨 말인지 알아 그래도 이건 인정해

translation.en: having our own penthouse is pretty cool.
Race you to the top!
[Arin] Last one there's a rotten egg!
-Hey, that's cheating! -See you!
translation.ko: 야, 그건 반칙이지! 안녕, 넌 별로 안녕하지 못하겠다

translation.en: -Wouldn't wanna be you! -Careful, Arin,
translation.ko: 안녕, 넌 별로 안녕하지 못하겠다 조심해! 너 지금 너무...

translation.en: -you're going too... -[clatters in distance] -[Arin] Dang it! -...fast.
Yes! SA-Mark-1 is gonna crush in the Mech-Master 5,000!
translation.ko: SA 마크-1이 메크 마스터5000을 휩쓸어 버릴 거야!

translation.en: Tomorrow's race is the biggest prize pot of all time.
translation.ko: 내일 대회는 역사상 가장 많은 상금이 걸린 경주야

translation.en: -If we win... -When we win.
[Arin] Right, right, when we win,
we could find ourselves a real place to live.
translation.ko: 그땐 진짜 제대로 된 집을 구할 수 있어

translation.en: I could build my own Monastery and invite everyone else
translation.ko: 난 나만의 사원을 세울 거야 그리고 부모를 잃은 아이들을 전부 모아서 같이 살래

translation.en: who lost their parents to live with us.
translation.ko: 그리고 부모를 잃은 아이들을 전부 모아서 같이 살래

translation.en: To carry on the tradition of the Ninja!
translation.ko: 그렇게 닌자의 전통을 이어 가는 거지

translation.en: And I could design a real garage and lab.
translation.ko: 난 제대로 된 차고랑 연구실을 만들 거야

translation.en: And we wouldn't have to pay for parts with your pies anymore.
translation.ko: 네가 만든 파이 대신 제대로 부품값을 낼 거고

translation.en: [sighs] Another earthquake?
It seems like they're happening more often.
They never happened at all before the Merge.
translation.ko: 병합이 일어나기 전엔 이런 적이 없었는데

translation.en: Hey, do you ever wonder if there's a greater purpose
translation.ko: 혹시 이 모든 일에 더 큰 목적이 있는 게 아닐까?

translation.en: for all of this? Like, a reason for the Merge?
translation.ko: 혹시 이 모든 일에 더 큰 목적이 있는 게 아닐까? 병합이 일어난 원인이라든가

translation.en: The Merge might have taken away everything you had, Arin,
translation.ko: 병합 때문에 넌 모든 걸 빼앗겼겠지만

translation.en: but it's given me everything I have.
Change can be scary.
But it's also a chance for something better.
translation.ko: 하지만 변화는 더 나은 걸 얻는 기회이기도 해

translation.en: The capture was successful?
Of course! Transfer will begin first thing in the morning.
translation.ko: 물론이죠 아침이 되면 바로 변신을 시작할 겁니다

translation.en: Your overconfidence is a weakness, Rapton.
translation.ko: 네 약점은 너무 지나친 자신감이야, 랩톤

translation.en: These creatures are dangerous.
Trust me, this thing isn't going anywhere.
translation.ko: 절 믿으세요 녀석들은 아무 데도 못 가요

translation.en: Don't worry, Lord Ras.
Do not disappoint me.
[claw 1] Lord Ras doesn't sound like he's got a lot of faith in us.
translation.ko: 라스 대장님은 우리를 별로 못 믿으시는 거 같아요

translation.en: He's too uptight.
We're the best there is at rounding up these animals.
translation.ko: 그 짐승들을 모으는 기술은 우리가 최고인데

translation.en: [in mocking voice] "Ugh, your overconfidence is a weakness."
[laughs] Let me tell you,
I've never even heard the word "weakness."
translation.ko: 난 살면서 약점이란 말을 들어 본 적도 없어

translation.en: [claw 1] Really? It's a pretty common word.
No. I...
I mean, I just don't know what that word means.
translation.ko: 내 말은 그게 무슨 뜻인지 모르겠다는 거지

translation.en: [claw 1] Seriously? I... I can explain.
Weakness, noun, the quality of...
-[grunts] -Go away.
This guy in here? He ain't goin' nowhere, ain't ya?
translation.ko: 여기 가둬 놨는데 절대 아무 데도 못 가지, 안 그래?

translation.en: The last call to register for the Mech-Master 5000!
translation.ko: 자, 지금이 메크 마스터5000에 참가 신청할 수 있는 마지막 기회입니다

translation.en: The greatest race...
[Sora] In the history of the Crossroads.
And we're here to win it!
Sora! Arin!
Always happy to peep you two wild scamps.
translation.ko: 너희 두 장난꾸러기들은 언제 봐도 반갑구나

translation.en: Up top!
Good to see you too, Mr. Frohicky.
Wait. That's your mech?
[chuckles] No offense, Sora, but, uh,
not one of your more impressive builds, is it, hmm?
translation.ko: 그런데 그렇게 인상적인 작품은 아닌 것 같다 그렇지? 응?

translation.en: It's easily underestimated. Just like us.
Sure, but I've got top mechs
translation.ko: 그렇구나 하지만 여기엔 여러 차원에서 온

translation.en: from around the merged realms here.
translation.ko: 하지만 여기엔 여러 차원에서 온 최고의 로봇들만 모였단다

translation.en: Like an Underworld Mech.
Freaky Leapy.
There's even a... uh, uh... [splutters]
translation.ko: 그리고 저기, 어어, 뭐더라? 어, 저런 것도 있어

translation.en: ...that thing.
[Lobbo] Lobbo-lobbo.
Oh, that's Lobbo! He's a good guy.
But, uh, never ask him about his mom.
translation.ko: 근데 쟤한테 엄마 얘기는 절대 하면 안 돼요

translation.en: It's a... it's a very touchy subject.
Plus, all the regulars.
It could get pretty vicious.
Maybe you should sit today's race out?
translation.ko: 음, 그래서 말인데 오늘은 그냥 빠지는 게 어때?

translation.en: [sighs] Fine. Then ante up!
I know you're not trying to pay your registration fees
translation.ko: 설마 이번에도 참가비 제대로 안 내고 네가 직접 구운 파이로 대충 때우려는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: with baked goods again.
translation.ko: 네가 직접 구운 파이로 대충 때우려는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: So you don't want a fresh pie
translation.ko: 그럼 이 갓 구운 파이가 싫으세요?

translation.en: filled with roasted snow-berries from the Never-Realm?
translation.ko: 네버 영역에서 온 구운 스노베리로 속을 꽉 채웠는데도요?

translation.en: Fine. I guess we'll just have to toss it.
translation.ko: 좋아요, 그럼 뭐 이건 그냥 아무한테나 줘야겠다

translation.en: Maybe the dogs are hungry.
Or maybe the raccoons?
Well, it'd be a shame to just throw it out.
translation.ko: 저기, 음 먹을 걸 그렇게 버리는 건 아니지 싶은데

translation.en: Fine. [laughs] Line up.
Ha! They'll let anyone into these races, won't they?
translation.ko: 이 대회는 선수를 아무나 다 받아 주나 봐, 그렇지?

translation.en: At least we build our own gear, Kreel.
translation.ko: 그래도 우린 장비를 직접 만들었어, 크릴

translation.en: We don't have a team of servants doing the work for us.
They aren't servants! They're friend-ish people
translation.ko: 얘들은 부하들이 아니라 친구거든? 나 대신 일해 주는 친구 같은 거

translation.en: who work for me.
translation.ko: 나 대신 일해 주는 친구 같은 거

translation.en: They're here to cheer when I crush you!
translation.ko: 내가 너희를 이길 때 축하하려고 왔어

translation.en: Like last time.
And the time before, and, checks notes...
translation.ko: 또 지지난번도 그랬지 그리고, 어머, 말도 안 돼

translation.en: [gasps] Every single time.
You kids don't learn.
Oh, we learn. But we just don't give up.
translation.ko: 아니야, 우리도 깨닫는 게 있어 포기를 안 하는 거지

translation.en: And I might've designed a bit of an upgrade since the last race.
translation.ko: 그리고 지난번 경주 이후로 설계를 살짝 업그레이드했거든

translation.en: Come on, Arin. Let's get our fuel couplings attached
translation.ko: 가자, 아린 크릴이 어떻게 질지 고민하는 동안

translation.en: while Kreel contemplates her impending loss.
translation.ko: 크릴이 어떻게 질지 고민하는 동안 우린 장비 점검이나 하자고

translation.en: I'm not worried.
[whispers] But just in case,
loosen their cooling cable while they're gone.
translation.ko: 쟤들이 자리 비울 때 냉각 케이블을 살짝 풀어

translation.en: When they hit their turboboost, their engine will overheat
translation.ko: 그럼 터보 부스트 기능을 켰을 때 엔진이 과열되면서 폭발할 거야

translation.en: and explode. [evil laugh]
Hey! Settle down in there!
translation.ko: 야, 그 안에 얌전히 좀 있어!

translation.en: Nice try, you animal.
You can't...
After that thing!
Are we winning? I can't see.
translation.ko: 이기고 있어? 안 보여서 그래 제발 그렇다고 해 줘

translation.en: Tell me we are winning!
translation.ko: 안 보여서 그래 제발 그렇다고 해 줘

translation.en: Not yet. Get the bumper arms up.
translation.ko: 아직 아니야, 범퍼 팔을 위로 올려

translation.en: [Lobbo] Lobbo on the move. Lobbo-lobbo!
We're coming for you, you fancy hatted ego-maniac.
translation.ko: 거기 딱 기다려 예쁘고 화려한 모자 중독자야!

translation.en: Hold on!
[Lobbo] Lobbo avoids hazards. Lobbo-lobbo.
Hit the turboboost!
No! We can only use it once!
translation.ko: 안 돼 그건 딱 한 번만 사용할 수 있어

translation.en: Saving it for when we really need it.
Those punks? Oh, no, they don't.
We're in the straightaway.
This has got to be the time to use the turboboost, right?
translation.ko: 터보 부스트를 쓸 때가 된 거지? 어? 맞지?

translation.en: -Right? -Yep! Get ready to roll around in prize money,
tossing it in the air and going "Whee-hee!"
translation.ko: 받게 되면 공중에 던지면서 이렇게 외치자, '이히!'

translation.en: Sora, go! We're so close!
We gotta go after that dragon.
What? We need to win this race!
Those dragon hunters are the Claws of Imperium!
translation.ko: 저 드래곤 사냥꾼들은 임페리움의 클로 부대야

translation.en: If they catch that dragon... [groans] ...the things they'll do to him. [gasps]
translation.ko: 드래곤이 잡히게 되면 무슨 일을 당할지...

translation.en: Trust me, we have to stop them.
translation.ko: 내 말 믿어, 녀석들을 막아야 돼

translation.en: [Sora] Arin! What would the Ninja do?
Let's save that dragon.
-[grunts] Get up! Get up! -[Lobbo] Lobbo-lobbo.
Lobbo wins!
Lobbo a success.
See, Lobbo's mother?
Can a "malfunctioning tin can" do that? Lobbo-lobbo.
translation.ko: 내가 정말 빈 깡통 로봇이라면 가능했을까요? 로보로보

translation.en: No need to tell Ras about this minor slip up, understood?
translation.ko: 라스 대장님께 알릴 거 없다 이런 사고는 별일 아니야, 알았지?

translation.en: [Arin] Hop on, buddy!
What? Who are these kids now? Get them!
translation.ko: 뭐야! 저 꼬마들은 대체 누구야? 어서 잡아!

translation.en: [Arin chuckles nervously] Uh, looks like we're in another race.
Then good thing we've still got that turboboost ready to go.
translation.ko: 터보 부스트를 안 쓰고 남겨 둬서 다행이야

translation.en: Uh, did one of us make that thing explode?
translation.ko: 방금 그 폭발 우리가 한 거 맞아?

translation.en: I mean... [chuckles] I'm sure it was us, right?
translation.ko: 아니, 당연히 우리가 한 거야 그렇지?

translation.en: [Rapton] Dragons are resilient.
Our target will survive.
Those kids, not so much.
Let's get down there and drag the lizard off the pavement.
translation.ko: 얼른 내려가서 그 드래곤만 끌고 가자

translation.en: [claw 1] That's different than it was before, right?
translation.ko: 저 로봇 아까는 저 모습이 아니었는데 그렇죠?

translation.en: [Arin] How did you do all this?
translation.ko: 너 무슨 수로 이런 게 다 가능해?

translation.en: I honestly do not know.
But now's not the time for questions.
translation.ko: 근데 지금은 그런 질문 할 때가 아니야

translation.en: It's the time for...
Now it's my turn!
Self-trained Wannabe Ninja without a master, go!
translation.ko: 사부님 없이 독학으로 배웠지만 언젠간 성공할 닌자고!

translation.en: Oh. Close enough.
Lord Ras, we were just about to...
You failed me.
I do not like that.
[Arin] Uh, do you know who this guy is?
-[Sora] No clue. -He doesn't seem very nice.
What? How'd you...
Arin!
You are just the first.
Now, I'm going to hunt down your entire family.
translation.ko: 지금부터 난 너희 가족 전부를 추적해서 잡아들일 거야

translation.en: Wherever they are.
Put the prisoners on the train. Quickly!
I trust you won't have any more problems.
translation.ko: 이젠 믿어도 되나? 설마 또 무슨 문제를 일으킬 건가?

translation.en: Yes, Lord Ras. I mean, no, Lord Ras.
What do you think they'll do to us?
Whatever it is, they'll do worse to that dragon.
Really?
The Claws of the Imperium come from Imperium,
same as me.
And Imperium runs entirely on dragon power.
translation.ko: 그리고 임페리움을 움직이는 건 드래곤의 힘이야

translation.en: With all these merged realms,
I'm sure they're hunting dragons everywhere now.
translation.ko: 녀석들은 어디서든 드래곤을 사냥할 수 있어

translation.en: But they say dragon power is safe.
Safe for who?
You saw the look in that dragon's eyes.
It wanted to be free.
Just like I did.
So, uh, I've known you for a while now,
translation.ko: 근데, 우리가 알고 지낸 지도 꽤 됐잖아?

translation.en: and you've always been pretty good with tech, but...
translation.ko: 네가 기계를 잘 다루는 건 알았지만 아까는...

translation.en: I have no idea.
You turned pieces of the SA-Mark-1
into a flying mech, in midair!
translation.ko: 비행 로봇으로 바꿔 버렸어 그것도 공중에서

translation.en: Yeah. That was weird, right?
Well, that's one word for it. Other words would be amazing,
translation.ko: 그렇게 표현할 수도 있겠지만 한편으론 엄청나던데

translation.en: impossible, defying all logic or reason!
It was that dragon.
I could feel it awaken something in me.
translation.ko: 걔 때문에 내 안의 뭔가가 깨어난 느낌이 들어

translation.en: Some kind of power.
Like the Elemental Powers the Ninja had!
translation.ko: 닌자들이 가진 원소의 힘 같은 건가 보다

translation.en: Powers I've dreamed of having.
translation.ko: 내가 늘 꿈꿔 왔던 힘 말이야

translation.en: Water, fire, ice.
Not everything is tied to your lost heroes, you know.
translation.ko: 매사를 그렇게 네 영웅들과 관련시키지 좀 마

translation.en: If I lose hope that the Ninja could come back,
translation.ko: 내가 닌자들이 돌아올 거란 희망을 버리게 되면

translation.en: then I lose hope my parents could come back.
translation.ko: 그땐 우리 부모님이 돌아오실 거란 희망도 없어져

translation.en: Hope is the only thing the Merge didn't take from me.
translation.ko: 희망은 병합이 나한테서 뺏어 가지 못한 유일한 거야

translation.en: Well, hope won't be enough anymore.
translation.ko: 이젠 그 희망도 얼마 안 남았어

translation.en: We can't build you a new Ninja Monastery from an Imperium prison.
translation.ko: 임페리움 감옥에 갇힐 텐데 거기서 새 닌자 사원을 세울 순 없잖아

translation.en: It's called the "Monastery of Spinjitzu."
But you're right. The dream's over, isn't it?
translation.ko: 근데 네 말이 맞아 내 꿈은 여기까지인가 봐

translation.en: [claw 2] Wait. Aren't you...
No way!
The Green Ninja.
I think that mask belongs to me.
